MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride, affecting properties in Dundas Court and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.51pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations and repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10PM on Thursday 25 February 2021.
